name: Reins of Unity
description: Cords that shine when you hold them up to the light. The people of old times presented these to the King of Bountiful Harvests to express their gratitude.

name: Potion
description: Restores the HP of a POKéMON by 20 points.
effect: Restores 20 HP.

name: Antidote
description: Heals a poisoned POKéMON.
effect: Cures poison.

name: Burn Heal
description: Heals POKéMON of a burn.
effect: Cures a burn.

name: Ice Heal
description: Defrosts a frozen POKéMON.
effect: Cures freezing.

name: Awakening
description: Awakens a sleeping POKéMON.
effect: Cures sleep.

name: Paralyze Heal
description: Heals a paralyzed POKéMON.
effect: Cures paralysis.

name: Full Restore
description: Fully restores the HP and status of a POKéMON.
effect: Restores HP to full and cures any status ailment and confusion.

name: Max Potion
description: Fully restores the HP of a POKéMON.
effect: Restores HP to full.

name: Hyper Potion
description: Restores the HP of a POKéMON by 200 points.
effect: Restores 200 HP.

name: Super Potion
description: Restores the HP of a POKéMON by 50 points.
effect: Restores 50 HP.

name: Full Heal
description: Heals all the status problems of one POKéMON.
effect: Cures any status ailment and confusion.

name: Revive
description: Revives a fainted POKéMON with half its HP.
effect: Revives with half HP.

name: Max Revive
description: Revives a fainted POKéMON with all its HP.
effect: Revives with full HP.

name: Fresh Water
description: A mineral water that restores HP by 50 points.
effect: Restores 50 HP.

name: Soda Pop

effect: Restores 60 HP.

name: Lemonade
description: A very sweet drink that restores HP by 80 points.
effect: Restores 80 HP.

name: Moomoo Milk
description: A nutritious milk that restores HP by 100 points.
effect: Restores 100 HP.

name: Energy Powder
description: A bitter powder that restores HP by 50 points.
effect: Restores 50 HP, but lowers happiness.

name: Energy Root
description: A bitter root that restores HP by 200 points.
effect: Restores 200 HP, but lowers happiness.

name: Heal Powder
description: A bitter powder that heals all status problems.
effect: Cures any status ailment, but lowers happiness.

name: Revival Herb
description: A very bitter herb that revives a fainted POKéMON.
effect: Revives with full HP, but lowers happiness.

name: Ether
description: Restores the PP of a selected move by 10.
effect: Restores 10 PP for one move.

name: Max Ether
description: Fully restores the PP of a selected move.

description: Restores the PP of all moves by 10.
effect: Restores 10 PP for each move.

name: Max Elixir

effect: Restores PP to full for each move.

name: Lava Cookie
description: A local specialty that heals all status problems.
effect: Cures any status ailment and confusion.

name: Berry Juice
description: A 100% pure juice that restores HP by 20 points.
effect: Restores 20 HP.

name: Sacred Ash
description: Fully revives and restores all fainted POKéMON.
effect: Revives all fainted Pokémon with full HP.

name: HP Up
description: Raises the HP of one POKéMON.
effect: Raises HP effort and happiness.

name: Protein
description: Raises the stat ATTACK of one POKéMON.
effect: Raises Attack effort and happiness.

name: Iron

effect: Raises Defense effort and happiness.

effect: Raises Speed effort and happiness.

effect: Raises Special Attack effort and happiness.

description: Raises the maximum PP of a selected move.
effect: Raises a move’s max PP by 20%.

effect: Raises Special Defense and happiness.

name: PP Max

effect: Cures any status ailment and confusion.

effect: Drops Defense Effort Values by 10 and raises happiness.

effect: Cures any status ailment and confusion.

effect: Switches a Pokémon between its two possible (non-Hidden) Abilities.

effect: Cures all major status ailments and confusion.

name: Shalour Sable
description: Shalour City’s famous shortbread. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
effect: Cures any major status ailment and confusion.

name: Big Malasada
description: The Alola region’s local specialty—fried bread. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
effect: Cures major status ailments and confusion.

name: Pewter Crunchies
description: Pewter City’s famous crunchy snack. They can be used to heal all status conditions of a single Pokémon.

name: Exp. Candy XS
description: A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it will grant a single Pokémon a very small amount of Exp. Points.

name: Exp. Candy S
description: A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it will grant a single Pokémon a small amount of Exp. Points.

name: Exp. Candy M
description: A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it will grant a single Pokémon a moderate amount of Exp. Points.

description: A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it will grant a single Pokémon a large amount of Exp. Points.

name: Exp. Candy XL
description: A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it will grant a single Pokémon a very large amount of Exp. Points.

name: Dynamax Candy
description: A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it will raise the Dynamax Level of a single Pokémon by one. A higher level means higher HP when Dynamaxed.

name: Max Honey
description: Honey that Dynamax Vespiquen produces. Adding this honey to Max Soup makes the taste very smooth. It also has the same effect as a Max Revive.

name: Ability Patch
description: A patch that allows a Pokémon with a regular Ability to have a rare Ability.

name: Master Ball
description: The best BALL that catches a POKéMON without fail.

name: Ultra Ball
description: A better BALL with a higher catch rate than a GREAT BALL.

name: Great Ball
description: A good BALL with a higher catch rate than a POKé BALL.

name: Poké Ball
description: A tool used for catching wild POKéMON.

name: Safari Ball
description: A special BALL that is used only in the SAFARI ZONE.

name: Net Ball
description: A BALL that works well on WATER- and BUG-type POKéMON.

name: Dive Ball
description: A BALL that works better on POKéMON on the ocean floor.

name: Nest Ball
description: A BALL that works better on weaker POKéMON.

name: Repeat Ball
description: A BALL that works better on POKéMON caught before.

name: Timer Ball
description: More effective as more turns are taken in battle.

name: Luxury Ball
description: A cozy BALL that makes POKéMON more friendly.

name: Premier Ball
description: A rare BALL made in commemoration of some event.

name: Dusk Ball
description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon at night or in dark places like caves.

name: Heal Ball
description: A remedial Poké Ball that restores the caught Pokémon’s HP and eliminates any status problem.

name: Quick Ball
description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that provides a better catch rate if it is used at the start of a wild encounter.

name: Cherish Ball
description: A quite rare Poké Ball that has been specially crafted to commemorate an occasion of some sort.

name: Park Ball
description: A special Poké Ball for the Pal Park.

name: Sport Ball
description: A special Poké Ball for the Bug-Catching Contest.

name: Dream Ball
description: A special Poké Ball that appears out of nowhere in a bag at the Entree Forest. It can catch any Pokémon.

name: Beast Ball
description: A special Poké Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts. It has a low success rate for catching others.

name: Guard Spec.
description: Prevents stat reduction when used in battle.
effect: Prevents stat changes in battle for five turns in battle.  Raises happiness.

name: Dire Hit
description: Raises the critical-hit ratio during one battle.
effect: Increases the chance of a critical hit in battle.  Raises happiness.

name: X Attack
description: Raises the stat ATTACK during one battle.
effect: Raises Attack by one stage in battle.  Raises happiness.

name: X Defense
description: Raises the stat DEFENSE during one battle.
effect: Raises Defense by one stage in battle.  Raises happiness.

name: X Speed
description: Raises the stat SPEED during one battle.
effect: Raises Speed by one stage in battle.  Raises happiness.

name: X Accuracy
description: Raises accuracy of attack moves during one battle.
effect: Raises accuracy by one stage in battle.  Raises happiness.

name: X Sp. Atk
description: Raises the stat SP. ATK during one battle.
effect: Raises Special Attack by one stage in battle.  Raises happiness.

name: X Sp. Def
description: An item that raises the Sp. Def stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
effect: Raises Special Defense by one stage in battle.  Raises happiness.

name: Bright Powder
description: A hold item that casts a glare to reduce accuracy.
effect: Held: Increases the holder’s evasion by 1/9 (11 1/9%).

name: White Herb
description: A hold item that restores any lowered stat.
effect: Held: Resets all lowered stats to normal at end of turn. Consumed after use.

name: Quick Claw
description: A hold item that occasionally allows the first strike.
effect: Held: Holder has a 3/16 (18.75%) chance to move first.

name: Mental Herb
description: A hold item that snaps POKéMON out of infatuation.
effect: Held: Consumed to cure infatuation. Gen V: Also removes Taunt, Encore, Torment, Disable, and Cursed Body.

name: Choice Band
description: Raises a move’s power, but permits only that move.
effect: Held: Increases Attack by 50%, but restricts the holder to only one move.

name: King’s Rock
description: A hold item that may cause flinching when the foe is hit.
effect: Held: Damaging moves gain a 10% chance to make their target flinch. Traded on a Poliwhirl: Holder evolves into Politoed. Traded on a Slowpoke: Holder evolves into Slowking.

name: Silver Powder
description: A hold item that raises the power of BUG-type moves.
effect: Held: Bug-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

name: Smoke Ball
description: A hold item that can be used to flee from a wild POKéMON.
effect: Held: Allows the Holder to escape from any wild battle.

name: Focus Band
description: A hold item that occasionally prevents fainting.
effect: Held: Holder has 10% chance to survive attacks or self-inflicted damage at 1 HP.

name: Scope Lens
description: A hold item that raises the critical- hit rate.
effect: Held: Raises the holder’s critical hit ratio by one stage.

name: Metal Coat
description: A hold item that raises the power of STEEL-type moves.
effect: Held: Steel-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

name: Leftovers
description: A hold item that gradually restores HP in battle.
effect: Held: Restores 1/16 (6.25%) holder’s max HP at the end of each turn.

name: Soft Sand
description: A hold item that raises the power of GROUND-type moves.

effect: Held: Electric-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

effect: Held: Water-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

effect: Held: Flying-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

effect: Held: Poison-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

effect: Held: Ice-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

effect: Held: Ghost-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

name: Twisted Spoon
description: A hold item that boosts PSYCHIC- type moves.
effect: Held: Psychic-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

name: Charcoal
description: A hold item that raises the power of FIRE-type moves.
effect: Held: Fire-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

name: Dragon Fang
description: A hold item that raises the power of DRAGON-type moves.
effect: Held: Dragon-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

name: Silk Scarf
description: A hold item that raises the power of NORMAL-type moves.
effect: Held: Normal-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

name: Shell Bell
description: A hold item that restores HP upon striking the foe.
effect: Held: Holder receives 1/8 of the damage it deals when attacking.

name: Sea Incense
description: A hold item that slightly boosts WATER-type moves.
effect: Held: Water-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Breeding: Marill or Azumarill beget an Azurill Egg.

name: Lax Incense
description: A hold item that slightly lowers the foe’s accuracy.
effect: Held: Holder’s evasion is increased by 5%. Breeding: Wobbuffet begets a Wynaut Egg.

name: Wide Lens
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a magnifying lens that slightly boosts the accuracy of moves.
effect: Held: Provides a 1/10 (10%) boost in accuracy to the holder.

name: Muscle Band
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a headband that slightly boosts the power of physical moves.
effect: Held: Boosts the damage of physical moves used by the holder by 10%.

name: Wise Glasses
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a thick pair of glasses that slightly boosts the power of special moves.
effect: Held: Boosts the damage of special moves used by the holder by 1/10 (10%).

name: Expert Belt
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a well-worn belt that slightly boosts the power of supereffective moves.
effect: Held: Holder’s Super Effective moves do 20% extra damage.

name: Light Clay
description: A Pokémon hold item that extends the duration of barrier moves like Light Screen and Reflect used by the holder.
effect: Held: Light Screen and Reflect used by the holder last 8 rounds instead of 5.

name: Life Orb
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the power of moves, but at the cost of some HP on each hit.
effect: Held: Holder’s moves inflict 30% extra damage, but cost 10% max HP.

name: Power Herb
description: A single-use item to be held by a Pokémon. It allows the immediate use of a move that charges on the first turn.
effect: Held: Both turns of a two-turn charge move happen at once. Consumed upon use.

name: Toxic Orb
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a bizarre orb that badly poisons the holder in battle.
effect: Held: Inflicts Toxic on the holder at the end of the turn. Activates after Poison damage would occur.

name: Flame Orb
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a bizarre orb that inflicts a burn on the holder in battle.
effect: Held: Inflicts Burn on the holder at the end of the turn. Activates after Burn damage would occur.

name: Focus Sash
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If it has full HP, the holder will endure one potential KO attack, leaving 1 HP.
effect: Held: Holder survives any single-hit attack at 1 HP if at max HP, then the item is consumed.

name: Zoom Lens
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder moves after the foe, its critical-hit ratio will be boosted.
effect: Held: Provides a 1/5 (20%) boost in accuracy if the holder moves after the target.

name: Metronome
description: A Pokémon hold item that boosts a move used consecutively. Its effect is reset if another move is used.
effect: Held: Consectutive uses of the same attack have a cumulative damage boost of 10%. Maximum 100% boost.

name: Iron Ball
description: A Pokémon hold item that cuts Speed. It makes Flying-type and levitating holders susceptible to Ground moves.
effect: Held: Holder’s Speed is halved. Negates all Ground-type immunities, and makes Flying-types take neutral damage from Ground-type moves. Arena Trap. Spikes, and Toxic Spikes affect the holder.

name: Lagging Tail
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is tremendously heavy and makes the holder move slower than usual.
effect: Held: Holder moves last in its priority bracket.

name: Destiny Knot
description: A long, thin, bright red string to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder becomes infatuated, the foe does too.
effect: Held: Infatuates opposing Pokémon when holder is inflicted with infatuation.

name: Black Sludge
description: A hold item that gradually restores the HP of Poison-type Pokémon. It inflicts damage on all other types.
effect: Held: Poison-type holder recovers 1/16 (6.25%) max HP each turn. Non-Poison-Types take 1/8 (12.5%) max HP damage.

name: Icy Rock
description: A Pokémon hold item that extends the duration of the move Hail used by the holder.
effect: Held: Hail by the holder lasts 8 rounds instead of 5.

name: Smooth Rock
description: A Pokémon hold item that extends the duration of the move Sandstorm used by the holder.
effect: Held: Sandstorm by the holder lasts 8 rounds instead of 5.

name: Heat Rock
description: A Pokémon hold item that extends the duration of the move Sunny Day used by the holder.
effect: Held: Sunny Day by the holder lasts 8 rounds instead of 5.

name: Damp Rock
description: A Pokémon hold item that extends the duration of the move Rain Dance used by the holder.
effect: Held: Rain Dance by the holder lasts 8 rounds instead of 5.

name: Grip Claw
description: A Pokémon hold item that extends the duration of multiturn attacks like Bind and Wrap.
effect: Held: Holder’s multi-turn trapping moves last 5 turns.

name: Choice Scarf
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This scarf boosts Speed, but allows the use of only one kind of move.
effect: Held: Increases Speed by 50%, but restricts the holder to only one move.

name: Sticky Barb
description: A hold item that damages the holder on every turn. It may latch on to foes that touch the holder.
effect: Held: Holder takes 1/8 (12.5%) its max HP at the end of each turn. When the holder is hit by a contact move, the attacking Pokémon takes 1/8 its max HP in damage and receive the item if not holding one.

name: Shed Shell
description: A tough, discarded carapace to be held by a Pokémon. It enables the holder to switch with a waiting Pokémon in battle.
effect: Held: Holder can bypass all trapping effects and switch out. Multi-turn moves still cannot be switched out of.

name: Big Root
description: A Pokémon hold item that boosts the power of HP-stealing moves to let the holder recover more HP.
effect: Held: Increases HP recovered from draining moves, Ingrain, and Aqua Ring by 3/10 (30%).

name: Choice Specs
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These distinctive glasses boost Sp. Atk, but allow only one kind of move to be used.
effect: Held: Increases Special Attack by 50%, but restricts the holder to only one move.

name: Odd Incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Psychic-type moves.
effect: Held: Psychic-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Breeding: Mr. Mime begets a Mime Jr. Egg.

name: Rock Incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Rock-type moves.
effect: Held: Rock-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Breeding: Sudowoodo begets a Bonsly Egg.

name: Full Incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that makes the holder bloated and slow moving.
effect: Held: Holder moves last in its priority bracket. Breeding: Snorlax begets a Munchlax Egg.

name: Wave Incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Water-type moves.
effect: Held: Water-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Breeding: Mantine begets a Mantyke Egg.

name: Rose Incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.
effect: Held: Grass-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Breeding: Roselia or Roserade beget a Budew Egg.

name: Razor Claw
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a sharply hooked claw that ups the holder’s critical-hit ratio.
effect: Held: Raises the holder’s critical hit ratio by one stage. Held by a Sneasel while levelling up at night: Holder evolves into Weavile.

name: Razor Fang
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It may cause the foe to flinch when the holder inflicts damage.
effect: Held: Damaging moves gain a 10% chance to make their target flinch. Held by a Gligar while levelling up: Holder evolves into Gliscor.

name: Eviolite
description: A mysterious evolutionary lump. When held, it raises the Defense and Sp. Def of a Pokémon that can still evolve.
effect: Held: Holder has 1.5× Defense and Special Defense, as long as it’s not fully evolved.

name: Float Stone
description: A very light stone. It reduces the weight of a Pokémon when held.
effect: Held: Holder has 0.5× weight.

name: Rocky Helmet
description: If the holder of this item takes damage, the attacker will also be damaged upon contact.
effect: Held: When the holder is hit by a contact move, the attacking Pokémon takes 1/6 its max HP in damage.

name: Air Balloon
description: When held by a Pokémon, the Pokémon will float into the air. When the holder is attacked, this item will burst.
effect: Held: Grants immunity to Ground-type moves, Spikes, and Toxic Spikes. Consumed when the holder takes damage from a move.

name: Red Card
description: A card with a mysterious power. When the holder is struck by a foe, the attacker is removed from battle.
effect: Held: When the holder takes damage from a move, the opponent switches out for another random party Pokémon. Consumed after use.

name: Ring Target
description: Moves that would otherwise have no effect will land on the Pokémon that holds it.
effect: Held: Negates the holder’s type immunities. Ability immunities are not removed.

name: Binding Band
description: A band that increases the power of binding moves when held.
effect: Held: Doubles the per-turn damage of multi-turn trapping moves.

name: Absorb Bulb
description: A consumable bulb. If the holder is hit by a Water-type move, its Sp. Atk will rise.
effect: Held: Raises the holder’s Special Attack by one stage when it takes Water-type damage.

name: Cell Battery
description: A consumable battery. If the holder is hit by an Electric-type move, its Attack will rise.
effect: Held: Raises the holder’s Attack by one stage when it takes Electric-type damage.

name: Eject Button
description: If the holder is hit by an attack, it will switch with another Pokémon in your party.
effect: Held: When the holder takes damage from a move, it switches out for a party Pokémon of the Trainer’s choice.

name: Fire Gem
description: A gem with an essence of fire. When held, it strengthens the power of a Fire-type move only once.
effect: Held: When the holder uses a damaging fire-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.

name: Water Gem
description: A gem with an essence of water. When held, it strengthens the power of a Water-type move only once.
effect: Held: When the holder uses a damaging water-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.

name: Weakness Policy
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Attack and Sp. Atk sharply increase if the holder is hit with a move it’s weak to.
effect: Held: When the holder is hit by a super effective move, its Attack and Special Attack raise by two stages.

name: Assault Vest
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This offensive vest raises Sp. Def but prevents the use of status moves.
effect: Raises the holder’s Special Defense to 1.5×.  Prevents the holder from selecting a status move.

name: Luminous Moss
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def if hit with a Water- type attack. It can only be used once.
effect: Held: If the holder is hit by a damaging Water move, raises its Special Defense by one stage.

name: Snowball
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Attack if hit with an Ice-type attack. It can only be used once.
effect: Held: If the holder is hit by a damaging Ice move, raises its Attack by one stage.

name: Safety Goggles
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These goggles protect the holder from both weather-related damage and powder.
effect: Held: Prevents damage from powder moves and the damage from Hail and Sandstorm.

name: Fairy Gem
description: A gem with an essence of the fey. When held, it strengthens the power of a Fairy-type move one time.
effect: Held: When the holder uses a damaging Fairy move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.

name: Adrenaline Orb
description: Using it makes wild Pokémon more likely to call for help. If held by a Pokémon, it boosts Speed when intimidated. It can be used only once.
effect: Makes wild Pokémon more likely to summon allies.  Held: increases the holder’s Speed by one stage when affected by Intimidate.

name: Terrain Extender
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the terrain caused by the holder’s move or Ability.
effect: Held: Extends the holder’s Terrain effects to 8 turns.

name: Protective Pads
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These pads protect the holder from effects caused by making direct contact with the target.
effect: Held: Prevents side effects of contact moves used on the holder.

name: Electric Seed
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Defense on Electric Terrain. It can only be used once.
effect: Held: Consumed on Electric Terrain and raises the holder’s Defense by one stage.

name: Psychic Seed
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def on Psychic Terrain. It can only be used once.
effect: Held: Consumed on Psychic Terrain and raises the holder’s Special Defense by one stage.

name: Misty Seed
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def on Misty Terrain. It can only be used once.
effect: Held: Consumed on Misty Terrain and raises the holder’s Special Defense by one stage.

name: Grassy Seed
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Defense on Grassy Terrain. It can only be used once.
effect: Held: Consumed on Grassy Terrain and raises the holder’s Defense by one stage.

name: Throat Spray
description: Raises Sp. Atk when a Pokémon uses a sound-based move.

name: Eject Pack
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder’s stats are lowered, it will be switched out of battle.

name: Heavy-Duty Boots
description: These boots prevent the effects of traps set on the battlefield.

name: Blunder Policy
description: Raises Speed sharply when a Pokémon misses with a move because of accuracy.

name: Room Service
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Lowers Speed when Trick Room takes effect.

name: Utility Umbrella
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This sturdy umbrella protects the holder from the effects of rain and harsh sunlight.

name: Max Mushrooms
description: Mushrooms that have the power of changing Dynamax forms. They boost all stats of a Pokémon during battle.

name: Surprise Mulch

name: Boost Mulch

name: Amaze Mulch

name: TM01

name: TM37: Sandstorm
description: Causes a sandstorm that hits the foe over several turns.

name: Liechi Berry

description: A hold item that raises DEFENSE in a pinch.

description: A hold item that raises SP. ATK in a pinch.

description: A hold item that raises SP. DEF in a pinch.

name: Lansat Berry
description: A hold item that ups the critical- hit rate in a pinch.

name: Starf Berry
description: A hold item that sharply boosts a stat in a pinch.

name: Enigma Berry
description: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow a mystery.

name: Micle Berry
description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it raises the accuracy of a move just once in a pinch.

name: Custap Berry
description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it gets to move first just once in a pinch.

name: Jaboca Berry
description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, and if a foe’s physical attack lands, the foe also takes damage.

name: Rowap Berry
description: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, and if a foe’s special attack lands, the foe also takes damage.

name: Macho Brace
description: A hold item that promotes growth, but reduces SPEED.

name: Exp. Share
description: A hold item that gets EXP. points from battles.

name: Soothe Bell
description: A hold item that calms spirits and fosters friendship.

name: Amulet Coin
description: Doubles money in battle if the holder takes part.

name: Cleanse Tag
description: A hold item that helps repel wild POKéMON.

name: Soul Dew
description: Hold item: Raises SP. ATK & SP. DEF of LATIOS & LATIAS.

name: Deep Sea Tooth
description: A hold item that raises the SP. ATK of CLAMPERL.

name: Deep Sea Scale
description: A hold item that raises the SP. DEF of CLAMPERL.

name: Everstone
description: A wondrous stone & a hold item that prevents evolution.

name: Lucky Egg
description: A hold item that boosts EXP. points earned in battle.

name: Light Ball
description: A hold item that raises the SP. ATK of PIKACHU.

name: Lucky Punch
description: A hold item that raises CHANSEY’s critical-hit rate.

name: Metal Powder
description: A hold item that raises DEFENSE.

name: Thick Club
description: A bone of some sort. It can be sold cheaply.

name: Leek
description: A stick of leek. It can be sold cheaply.

name: Red Scarf
description: A hold item that raises COOL in CONTESTS.

name: Blue Scarf
description: A hold item that raises BEAUTY in CONTESTS.

name: Pink Scarf
description: A hold item that raises CUTE in CONTESTS.

name: Green Scarf
description: A hold item that raises SMART in CONTESTS.

name: Yellow Scarf
description: A hold item that raises TOUGH in CONTESTS.

name: Quick Powder
description: An item to be held by DITTO. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Speed stat.

name: Power Bracer
description: A Pokémon hold item that promotes Attack gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

name: Power Belt
description: A Pokémon hold item that promotes Defense gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

name: Power Lens
description: A Pokémon hold item that promotes Sp. Atk gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

name: Power Band
description: A Pokémon hold item that promotes Sp. Def gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

name: Power Anklet
description: A Pokémon hold item that promotes Speed gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

name: Power Weight
description: A Pokémon hold item that promotes HP gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

name: Luck Incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It doubles a battle’s prize money if the holding Pokémon joins in.

name: Pure Incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It helps keep wild Pokémon away if the holder is the first one in the party.

name: Explorer Kit
description: A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring. It provides access to the Underground.

name: Fashion Case
description: A fancy case for the tidy and organized storage of colorful Pokémon Accessories.

name: Seal Bag
description: A tiny bag that can hold ten Seals for decorating Poké Balls.

name: Fishing Rod
description: The best fishing rod for catching wild POKéMON.

name: Bicycle
description: A folding bicycle that is faster than the RUNNING SHOES.

name: Contest Pass
description: The pass required for entering POKéMON CONTESTS.

name: Griseous Orb
description: A glowing orb to be held by GIRATINA. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Ghost-type moves.

name: Apricorn Box
description: A handy box where you can store up to 99 Apricorns of each kind.

name: Berry Pots
description: Handy containers for cultivating Berries wherever you go.

name: Lure Ball
description: A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon hooked by a Rod when fishing.

name: Level Ball
description: A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that are a lower level than your own.

name: Moon Ball
description: A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that evolve using the Moon Stone.

name: Heavy Ball
description: A Poké Ball for catching very heavy Pokémon.

name: Fast Ball
description: A Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch fast Pokémon.

name: Friend Ball
description: A Poké Ball that makes caught Pokémon more friendly.

name: Love Ball
description: Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that are the opposite gender of your Pokémon.

name: Red Apricorn
description: A red Apricorn. It assails your nostrils.

name: Blue Apricorn
description: A blue Apricorn. It smells a bit like grass.

name: Yellow Apricorn
description: A yellow Apricorn. It has an invigorating scent.

name: Green Apricorn
description: A green Apricorn. It has a mysterious, aromatic scent.

name: Pink Apricorn
description: A pink Apricorn. It has a nice, sweet scent.

name: White Apricorn
description: A white Apricorn. It doesn’t smell like anything.

name: Black Apricorn
description: A black Apricorn It has an indescribable scent.

name: Rage Candy Bar
description: A famous candy in Mahogany Town. Many tourists like to buy them to take home.

name: Unown Report
description: A report of all the discovered kinds of UNOWN.

name: Slowpoke Tail
description: A very tasty tail of something. It sells for a high price.

name: Mach Bike
description: A folding bicycle that more than doubles foot speed.

name: Acro Bike
description: A folding bicycle capable of jumps and wheelies.

name: Go-Goggles
description: Nifty goggles that protect eyes from desert sandstorms.

name: Douse Drive
description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Techno Blast to a Water-type move.

name: Shock Drive
description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Techno Blast to an Electric-type move.

name: Burn Drive
description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Techno Blast to a Fire-type move.

name: Chill Drive
description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Techno Blast to an Ice-type move.

name: Pretty Feather
description: Though this feather is beautiful, it’s just a regular feather and has no effect on Pokémon.

name: Prop Case
description: A lovely case to store colorful Props for your Pokémon to wear in a musical.

name: Balm Mushroom
description: A rare mushroom which gives off a nice fragrance. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Big Nugget
description: A big nugget of pure gold that gives off a lustrous gleam. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Pearl String
description: Very large pearls that sparkle in a pretty silver color. A maniac will buy them for a high price.

name: Comet Shard
description: A shard which fell to the ground when a comet approached. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: DNA Splicers
description: A splicer that fuses Kyurem and a certain Pokémon. They are said to have been one in the beginning.

name: Oval Charm
description: An oval charm said to increase the chance of Eggs being found at the Day Care.

name: Shiny Charm
description: A shiny charm said to increase the chance of finding a Shiny Pokémon.

name: Reveal Glass
description: A glass that reveals the truth. It is a mysterious glass that returns a Pokémon back to its original shape.

name: Roseli Berry
description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Fairy-type attack.

name: Kee Berry
description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the holder’s Defense if it’s hit with a physical move.

name: Maranga Berry
description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the holder’s Sp. Def if it’s hit with a special move.

name: Contest Costume
description: A very cool suit to be worn during the Contest Spectacular.

name: Prison Bottle
description: A bottle believed to have been used to seal away the power of a certain Pokémon long, long ago.

name: Key Stone
description: A stone filled with an unexplained power. It makes Pokémon that battle with a Mega Stone Mega Evolve.

name: Bottle Cap
description: A beautiful bottle cap that gives off a silver gleam. Some people are happy to receive one.

name: Gold Bottle Cap
description: A beautiful bottle cap that gives off a golden gleam. Some people are happy to receive one.

name: Red Nectar
description: A flower nectar obtained at Ula’ula Meadow. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.

name: Yellow Nectar
description: A flower nectar obtained at Melemele Meadow. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.

name: Pink Nectar
description: The flower nectar obtained at the flowering shrubs on Royal Avenue. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.

name: Purple Nectar
description: A flower nectar obtained at Poni Meadow. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.

name: Normalium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Normal-type moves to Normal-type Z-Moves.

name: Firium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Fire-type moves to Fire-type Z-Moves.

name: Waterium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Water-type moves to Water-type Z-Moves.

name: Electrium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Electric-type moves to Electric-type Z-Moves.

name: Grassium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Grass-type moves to Grass-type Z-Moves.

name: Icium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Ice-type moves to Ice-type Z-Moves.

name: Fightinium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Fighting-type moves to Fighting-type Z-Moves.

name: Poisonium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Poison-type moves to Poison-type Z-Moves.

name: Groundium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Ground-type moves to Ground-type Z-Moves.

name: Flyinium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Flying-type moves to Flying-type Z-Moves.

name: Psychium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Psychic-type moves to Psychic-type Z-Moves.

name: Buginium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Bug-type moves to Bug-type Z-Moves.

name: Rockium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Rock-type moves to Rock-type Z-Moves.

name: Ghostium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Ghost-type moves to Ghost-type Z-Moves.

name: Dragonium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Dragon-type moves to Dragon-type Z-Moves.

name: Darkinium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Dark-type moves to Dark-type Z-Moves.

name: Steelium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Steel-type moves to Steel-type Z-Moves.

name: Fairium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Fairy-type moves to Fairy-type Z-Moves.

name: Pikanium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Pikachu’s Volt Tackle to an exclusive Z-Move.

name: Decidium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Decidueye’s Spirit Shackle to an exclusive Z-Move.

name: Incinium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Incineroar’s Darkest Lariat to an exclusive Z-Move.

name: Primarium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Primarina’s Sparkling Aria to an exclusive Z-Move.

name: Tapunium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade the tapu’s Nature’s Madness to an exclusive Z-Move.

name: Marshadium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Marshadow’s Spectral Thief to an exclusive Z-Move.

name: Aloraichium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Alolan Raichu’s Thunderbolt to an exclusive Z-Move.

name: Snorlium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Snorlax’s Giga Impact to an exclusive Z-Move.

name: Eevium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Eevee’s Last Resort to an exclusive Z-Move.

name: Mewnium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Mew’s Psychic to an exclusive Z-Move.

name: Pikashunium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade a Thunderbolt by Pikachu in a cap to an exclusive Z-Move.

name: Solganium Z
description: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Solgaleo’s Sunsteel Strike to a Z-Move.

name: Lunalium Z
description: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Lunala’s Moongeist Beam to a Z-Move.

name: Ultranecrozium Z
description: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Necrozma’s Photon Geyser to a Z-Move.

name: Mimikium Z
description: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Mimikyu’s Play Rough to a Z-Move.

name: Lycanium Z
description: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Lycanroc’s Stone Edge to a Z-Move.

name: Kommonium Z
description: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Kommo-o’s Clanging Scales to a Z-Move.

name: N-Solarizer
description: A machine to fuse Necrozma, which needs light, and Solgaleo.

name: N-Lunarizer
description: A machine to fuse Necrozma, which needs light, and Lunala.

name: Pokémon Box Link
description: A device that allows you to access the Pokémon storage system. There are some places where it won’t work.

name: Fishing Rod
description: Use it by the water to fish up various kinds of Pokémon.

name: Sausages
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. These sausages should be boiled before eating.

name: Bob’s Food Tin
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. The tinned food that Bob sells is curiously popular in Galar.

name: Bach’s Food Tin
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. The tinned food that Bach sells is curiously popular in Galar.

name: Tin of Beans
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. When simmered, the beans suffuse a dish with their mild flavor.

name: Bread
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. An indispensable tool for mopping up that extra curry left on your plate.

name: Pasta
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. These flour noodles make for a surprisingly good match with curry.

name: Mixed Mushrooms
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. The chewy texture of the mushrooms transforms any dish they’re added to.

name: Smoke-Poke Tail
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. When a Slowpoke’s tail falls off, it grows back quickly.

name: Large Leek
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. Whether this is the kind of vegetable stalk that Farfetch’d like is unknown.

name: Fancy Apple
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. An apple chosen above others. It has spectacular form and a brilliant sheen.

name: Brittle Bones
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. The taste boiled off from the bones is sure to give a dish a light umami taste.

name: Pack of Potatoes
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. Potatoes help mellow out a spicy taste, to make a dish more mild.

name: Pungent Root
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. Though carelessly picked, these herbs can add a fragrant accent to a dish.

name: Salad Mix
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. The assortment of vegetables looks quite appealing and healthy.

name: Fried Food
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. It’s been a while since it was fried, so it’s gotten greasy.

name: Boiled Egg
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. Even just one boiled egg can really enhance a dish.

name: Camping Gear
description: Everything you need to set up a tent and get cooking in a Wild Area or at a camping spot.

name: Rusted Sword
description: It is said that a hero used this sword to halt a terrible disaster in ancient times. But it’s grown rusty and worn.

name: Rusted Shield
description: It is said that a hero used this shield to halt a terrible disaster in ancient times. But it’s grown rusty and worn.

name: Fruit Bunch
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. The syrupy fruits give off a strong tropical feel.

name: Moomoo Cheese
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. Melted cheese can really give a curry some richness.

name: Spice Mix
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. There are over fifty spices contained within this ingredient’s hot flavor.

name: Fresh Cream
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. Add some whipped cream to a spicy curry to give it some sweetness.

name: Packaged Curry
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. Using packaged curry helps make sure there are no slipups when cooking.

name: Coconut Milk
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. The refined sweetness of this coconut milk makes it quite popular.

name: Instant Noodles
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. It has a junk-food sort of taste, but it goes well with curry.

name: Precooked Burger
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. If you’re unsure about what to cook, you can’t go wrong with some burger.

name: Gigantamix
description: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. A mysterious spice. Even a tiny sprinkle is sure to make a curry gigantic.

name: Catching Charm
description: Holding it is said to increase the chance of getting a critical catch. Curiously, the charm doesn’t shake much.

name: Galarica Twig
description: A twig from a species of tree called Galarica that grows in certain areas around the Galar region. It’s a material for an accessory for a certain Pokémon.

name: Galarica Cuff
description: A cuff made from woven-together Galarica Twigs. Giving it to Galarian Slowpoke makes the Pokémon very happy.

name: Exp. Charm
description: A charm that increases the Exp. Points that Pokémon can get. A machine-like object is inside the charm.

name: Mark Charm
description: A mysterious and unique charm that increases the chance of finding a Pokémon with a mark.

name: Galarica Wreath
description: A wreath made from woven-together Galarica Twigs. Placing it on the head of a Galarian Slowpoke makes the Pokémon very happy.
